name: La Isla Perla
description:
What if a castaway were to fall in love with the resident mermaid?

Created alongside the Castaway Jam 2022!

This 1.0 base game is free, but in future we will add an artbook and NSFW scene edition that can be accessed via donation! <3 If you donate and would like to be notified when these become available, do let me know!

Additionally, a 1.1 update will be created in the next couple of months to add backgrounds and extra refinement. 

Thank you so much for playing!
Feel free to leave feedback below <3

CREDITS
